contentrichtext.text: '''VAD''' may refer to: *[[Vertebral artery dissection]], the development of a flap-like tear in the vertebral artery *[[Ventricular assist device]], a mechanical circulatory device used to replace the function of a failing heart *[[Vitamin A deficiency]], a lack of vitamin A in humans *[[Voice activity detection]], a technique in which the presence or absence of human speech is detected *[[IVR#Voice-Activated Dialling|Voice-Activated Dialling]], the use of speech recognition to identify the destination for a telephone call *[[Voluntary Aid Detachment]], a voluntary organisation providing field nursing services in the British Empire * Vincristine, Adriamycin (doxorubicin), Dexamethasone; a [[chemotherapy regimen]] used for multiple myeloma See also [[Vad (disambiguation)]]. {{disambiguation}}
